The EPA: s reference to the "Inventory of U.S. Greenhouse Gas Emissions and Sinks" report as supporting evidence.
The contradiction between the EPA: s claim and the data in the report, which shows the decline in emissions occurred during President Obama's final year in office.
The alternative study by BP: called the Statistical Review of World Energy, which also showed a decline in emissions under Trump but at a slower rate compared to the late Obama era.
